title: Neuold Mono, Crouwel Reinterpreted
content:
I've finished a project which I'd started a couple months ago ( [old thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016153932/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/17772.html)) to reconstruct Crouwel's New Alphabet. I wasn't able to find a full sample of all the characters so I extrapolated from what I could find and came up with a complete ASCII set. I put it all together in a free Opentype font. You can find the font and more info at my [weblog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016153932/http:/www.xtypa.com/archives/000041.html).   
   
 ![Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016153932im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/23174.gif)
author: Aaron Sittig
